title: Payment Methods

subtitle: Secure and fast ways to top up your balance

securityDescription: For your safety, all data is protected and never stored.

secureAndFastPaymentMethods: Secure and fast ways to top up your balance
loginToMakePayments: Please log in to make payments
paymentCreationError: An error occurred while creating the payment

enterNewCardData: Enter new card data to complete payment

antiFraudMessage: We need to verify your payment details for security. Please provide a different card to continue with your transaction. This helps us ensure safe and secure payments for all users.
allDataSentSecurely: All data is transmitted over a secure connection
trackPaymentProgress: Track your payment progress in real time

checking.title: Anti-Fraud System Check
checking.antifraud_check: Anti-fraud system is checking your card

allDataTransmittedSecurely: All data is transmitted over a secure connection and is not stored in the system. Used only for bank authorization.
